member.name: T:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryBooleanFormat
member.summary: Represents the set of formats of binary boolean encodings.

member.name: F:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryBooleanFormat.NonZeroByte
member.summary: The boolean is stored in 1 byte and is true when the value is not 0. This is the .NET default.

member.name: F:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryBooleanFormat.NonZeroWord
member.summary: The boolean is stored in 2 bytes and is true when the value is not 0.

member.name: F:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryBooleanFormat.NonZeroDword
member.summary: The boolean is stored in 4 bytes and is true when the value is not 0.

member.name: T:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryDateTimeFormat
member.summary: Represents the set of formats of binary date and time encodings.

member.name: F:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryDateTimeFormat.NetTicks
member.summary: The is stored as the ticks of a .NET instance.

member.name: F:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryDateTimeFormat.CTime
member.summary: The has the time_t format of the C library.

member.name: T:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryStringFormat
member.summary: Represents the set of formats of binary string encodings.

member.name: F:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryStringFormat.VariableLengthPrefix
member.summary: The string has a prefix of variable size determining the length of the string and no postfix. This is the .NET default.

member.name: F:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryStringFormat.ByteLengthPrefix
member.summary: The string has a prefix of 1 byte determining the length of the string and no postfix.

member.name: F:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryStringFormat.WordLengthPrefix
member.summary: The string has a prefix of 2 bytes determining the length of the string and no postfix.

member.name: F:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryStringFormat.DwordLengthPrefix
member.summary: The string has a prefix of 4 bytes determining the length of the string and no postfix.

member.name: F:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryStringFormat.ZeroTerminated
member.summary: The string has no prefix and is terminated with a byte of the value 0.

member.name: F:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryStringFormat.NoPrefixOrTermination
member.summary: The string has neither prefix nor postfix. This format is only valid for writing strings. For reading strings, the length has to be specified manually.

member.name: T:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryDataReader
member.summary: Represents an extended supporting special file format data types.

member.name: M:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryDataReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified stream and using UTF-8 encoding.
member.param: The input stream.
member.exception: The stream does not support reading, is null, or is already closed.

member.name: M:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryDataReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified stream, UTF-8 encoding and optionally leaves the stream open.
member.param: The input stream.
true to leave the stream open after the object is disposed; otherwise false.
member.exception: The stream does not support reading, is null, or is already closed.

member.name: M:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryDataReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified stream and character encoding.
member.param: The input stream.
The character encoding to use.
member.exception: The stream does not support reading, is null, or is already closed.

member.name: M:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryDataReader.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified stream and character encoding, and optionally leaves the stream open.
member.param: The input stream.
The character encoding to use.
true to leave the stream open after the object is disposed; otherwise false.
member.exception: The stream does not support reading, is null, or is already closed.

member.summary: Gets or sets the byte order used to parse binary data with.

member.name: P:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryDataReader.Encoding
member.summary: Gets the encoding used for string related operations where no other encoding has been provided. Due to the way the underlying is instantiated, it can only be specified at creation time.

member.name: P:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryDataReader.EndOfStream
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the end of the stream has been reached and no more data can be read.

member.name: P:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryDataReader.Length
member.summary: Gets the length in bytes of the stream in bytes. This is a shortcut to the base stream Length property.

member.name: P:Syroot.BinaryData.BinaryDataReader.NeedsReversion
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether multibyte data requires to be reversed before being parsed, according to the set .
